boardgame.description: In this classic Steve Jackson (I) game of world domination, each player is a secret society attempting to spread its tendrils into special interest groups throughout the world. This latest edition comes with additional cards and reworked graphics to bring the venerable game up to date._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-issue of:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati (Small plastic box with 54 black and white cards and paper money)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansions:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Y2K_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Brainwash (re-work of Illuminati Expansion Set 3)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Bavarian Fire Drill_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Mutual Assured Distraction_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Spin Off:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Illuminati: Crime Lords_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Steve Jackson Games (SJG 1305) They_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re all around us. Secret conspiracies are everywhere, and where can you find the only truth? Certainly not in the game of Illuminati. Fnord. The object of Illuminati is to take control of the world. The phone company is controlled by creatures from outer space. The Congressional Wives have taken over the Pentagon. And the Boy Sprouts are cashing in their secret Swiss bank account to smash the IRS! Two to six players compete to grab powerful groups and increase their wealth and power. No ploy is too devious, no stratagem too low, as you scheme your way to victory. Start your plot for world domination with Deluxe Illuminati. This new edition features full-color cards and improved money chits . . . but it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the same game you know and fear, of secret conspiracies battling for world control. Designed by Steve Jackson Cover Art by David Martin Illustrated by Dan Smith, Clifford VanMeter, Shea Ryan, John Grigni 110 cards, 1 sheet of cardboard counters, 2 dice, rules.
Never been played. All pieces, cards and box in excellent condition. Kept in a smoke-free house. Shipping will be FedEx from Florida.

THIS ITEM CAN ONLY BE PURCHASED BY Stuart Middleton (goonahboy), AS HE WON IT IN A GEEKLIST AUCTION. (If you are not him, please do not try to buy this item.) NOTE: This game is NOT complete and requires you to add components to be fully playable! (See the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Condition_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; notes below.) Why It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Cool: It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the original Deluxe Edition of Steve Jackson_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s game of weird conspiracies vying to control and mess with the world. Get Weird with The Discordians. Fire up the Orbital Mind Control Lasers with the UFOs. Discover the secrets of fnord. Condition: The box has a fair degree of wear, though none of the corners are split. The cards are actually in great shape; Excellent Condition, in fact. However, the money tokens are all missing and some sort of replacement (tokens or poker chips) would have to be made to play the game. This is one of the earlier versions of the Deluxe Edition - circa 1993. It features bridge-size cards with the original black-and-white artwork and plastic poker chips with denomination stickers (though, as I said, the tokens and stickers are missing from this copy).
for user spirit of 70 only

Steve Jackson Games (SJG 1305) They_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re all around us. Secret conspiracies are everywhere, and where can you find the only truth? Certainly not in the game of Illuminati. Fnord. The object of Illuminati is to take control of the world. The phone company is controlled by creatures from outer space. The Congressional Wives have taken over the Pentagon. And the Boy Sprouts are cashing in their secret Swiss bank account to smash the IRS! Illuminati is a classic. It was an instant hit when it was first released in 1982 and won the Origins Award for Best Science Fiction Boardgame. It has been Steve Jackson_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s signature title ever since. Two to six players compete to take control of groups ranging from the FBI and CIA to the Dentists, increasing their wealth and power for further takeovers, until one rules supreme. Every player has different victory conditions! No ploy is too devious, no stratagem too low, as you scheme your way to victory.
1999 edition, with full color cards. Complete and in excellent condition.
